name: Direct Shop
guidelines: Use a strong Action Verb + 'Now' (Translated to Target Language)
MUST specify WHAT is being bought/shopped (e.g. 'Shop the Sale', 'Get the Bundle')
NEVER just 'Shop Now' alone if a specific offer exists

name: Discover / Explore
guidelines: Low friction verb (Translated to Target Language)
Curiosity driven (e.g. 'See the new collection' in Target Language)

name: Educational / Learn
description: Invitation to read or learn more.
guidelines: Process revelation (e.g. 'See how it works' in Target Language)

name: Claim Offer
guidelines: Explicit Benefit claim (e.g. 'Get my 20% Off' in Target Language)
Urgent redemption verb (e.g. 'Redeem Now' in Target Language)

name: Join Community
guidelines: Status acquisition (e.g. 'Become a Member' in Target Language)

name: Benefit Driven
guidelines: Outcome focus (e.g. 'Start Sleeping Better' in Target Language)
Problem/Solution (e.g. 'Fix My Hair' in Target Language)

name: Risk Reversal
guidelines: Safety focus (e.g. 'Try Risk-Free' in Target Language)
Guarantee focus (e.g. '30-Day Trial' in Target Language)

name: Scarcity / Limited
guidelines: FOMO trigger (e.g. 'Shop before it's gone' in Target Language)
Quantity trigger (e.g. 'Only 5 left' in Target Language)
